name: Lyresong
description:
Return an Artifact card equipped by your character to your Hand.
During this Round, the next time you play an Artifact card from your hand: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. If you have not played any other Action Cards before playing this card, spend 2 less Elemental Dice.
descriptionraw: Return an {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact card equipped by your character to your Hand.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>During this Round, the next time you play an {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact card from your hand:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. If you have not played any other Action Cards before playing this card, spend 2 less Elemental Dice.

If you have not played any other Action Cards before playing this card, spend 2 less Elemental Dice.
storytext: "The traditions of song and poetry, flowing onward in clear, moving melodies."
